strapiPost.title: Listening Forest Reopens Tonight At Crystal Bridges
strapiPost.photoCredit: Crystal Bridges Museum of American Art
strapiPost.content:
The interactive Listening Forest returns tonight to light up the forest around the art museum until the end of May, and that's just one of several engaging exhibits currently on display at Crystal Bridges.

  • Reliving Rivera: Uncover the social and cultural life of Mexico and America in Diego Rivera's America, the first major exhibition focused exclusively on Mexican artist Diego Rivera in over 20 years. 
  • Portraits: Explore American identities, human relationships, and current events through one of the 20th and 21st century's most celebrated photographers Annie Leibovitz.

See Crystal Bridges' full 2023 exhibition lineup HERE.
